panels.description: Top SQL ordered by Elapsed Time

targets.expr:
topk(200,(
   sum(max_over_time(mssql_top_elapsed_sql{alias=~"$alias"}[$__range]) / 1000000 -
       min_over_time(mssql_top_elapsed_sql{alias=~"$alias"}[$__range]) / 1000000)
    by (job, alias, db, instance, query_hash, partial_query) 
))

topk(200,(
   sum(max_over_time(mssql_top_cpu_sql{alias=~"$alias"}[$__range]) / 1000000 -
       min_over_time(mssql_top_cpu_sql{alias=~"$alias"}[$__range]) / 1000000)
    by (job, alias, db, instance, query_hash, partial_query) 
))

topk(200,(
   sum(max_over_time(mssql_top_exec_sql{alias=~"$alias"}[$__range]) -
       min_over_time(mssql_top_exec_sql{alias=~"$alias"}[$__range]))
    by (job, alias, db, instance, query_hash, partial_query) 
))

topk(200,(
   sum(max_over_time(mssql_top_logical_read_sql{alias=~"$alias"}[$__range]) -
       min_over_time(mssql_top_logical_read_sql{alias=~"$alias"}[$__range]))
    by (job, alias, db, instance, query_hash, partial_query) 
))
